newsitem.title: USA: KANSAS FED CATTLE MONDAY ROUNDUP - USDA.
newsitem.headline: KANSAS FED CATTLE MONDAY ROUNDUP - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow, with few sales slaughter steers and heifers steady, USDA said.

Inquiry was moderate and demand light. Sales confirmed on 700 slaughter steers and 500 slaughter heifers Monday. For the week to date 17,200 head confirmed including 13,700 head previously contracted or formulated cattle. Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Confirmed - 1,200 last week - none last year - 100
Wk to date - 17,200 last week - 13,300 last year - 8,600
